English: Pan Jinlian (name lit. Golden Lotus), heroine of Ming dynasty vernacular novel Jinpingmei or the Golden Lotus `金瓶梅~

d.f: `小說~《`金瓶梅~》`中的~`人物~。`妖媚~`陰~`殘~，`毒害~`親~`夫~`武大郎~，`與~`西門~`慶~`姘~`淫~`為~`惡~，`最後~`死~`在~`武松~`手下~。`後世~`娼妓~`多~`以為~`行神~。

English: Pan Jinlian (name lit. Golden Lotus), heroine of Ming dynasty vernacular novel Jinpingmei or the Golden Lotus `金瓶梅~
